section.heading: Duration of abduction prevention order.
section.text: An abduction prevention order remains in effect until the earliest of:

para.text: The time stated in the order;
The child’s attaining 18 years of age; or
The time the order is modified, revoked, vacated, or superseded by a court with jurisdiction under §§ 16-4602.01 to 16-4602.03.

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 10 of the Uniform Child Abduction Prevention Act.
